projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Displays weather info of some places in Idaho, USA. This is responsive web app. Made with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JS, Fetch API, and DOM manipulation.

projects.name: To-do List App
projects.description: You can add a to-do item, mark done items, completely delete items, filter items with all, active, or completed. Made with vanilla JS. I used the localStorage API for saving and removing list item.

projects.name: COVID-19 App
projects.description: You can search a live COVID-19 data of a specific country. Displays the COVID-19 data worldwide. Made with HTML5, CSS3, and Vanilla JS, Fetch API, and DOM manipulation.

projects.name: Zen Garden
projects.description: My group's version of Zen Garden Project. Zen Garden is to demonstrate what you can do with CSS. My group and I made this with SASS and GitHub.

projects.name: Tenzies Game
projects.description: Roll the dice, freeze the dice with same numbers, roll the dice again until all the dice have the same numbers. Made with React JS.

projects.name: Kitchen Warehouse
projects.description: Coded a wireframe from Kitchen Warehouse, an Australia-based company. This shows my skill in developing a website from a Figma file to HTML and CSS files. This is only for desktop and not responsive version.
